alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 1:44AM MST until December 24 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Thursday to 6 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
